com.acas.sources

Class ACAS

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.acas.sources.ACAS

  • public class ACAS
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the main class of the ACAS framework, use it for access all features.
    Author:
    Christophe

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static void addToListenerList(ACASOnMessageReceivedListener listener)
      Use for add an receiver to listener list, it will notified of all future ACASMessage who application receive Don't forget to remove it with removeToListenerList(ACASOnMessageReceivedListener)} !
      static void addToListenerModuleList(ACASOnListModuleReceiver listener)
      Use for add an receiver to listener list, it will notified of all future ACASModule who the application receives Don't forget to remove it with removeToListenerModuleList(ACASOnListModuleReceiver) !
      static void addToListenerModuleList(ACASOnListModuleReceiver listener, java.lang.String entryPoint)
      Use for add an receiver to listener list, it will notified of the ACASModule that the application receives filtered by @entryPoint Don't forget to remove it with removeToListenerModuleList(ACASOnListModuleReceiver) !

    • Method Detail

      • initiate

        public static void initiate(Context context,
            java.lang.String securityKey)

        Use for initiate the ACAS library

        It is mandatory to use this before all other.

        Parameters:
        context - The application context
        securityKey - The security key provided at the creation of your application on the ACAS website.

      • setDebugMode

        public static void setDebugMode(boolean debugState)

        Use this method for set the debug mode

        Parameters:
        debugState - true for enable the debug mode

      • isDebugMode

        public static boolean isDebugMode()

        Get if the debug mode is enable

        Returns:
        true if debug mode is enable or false otherwise

      • isInitiate

        public static boolean isInitiate()

        Get if the ACAS lib is initiate

        Returns:
        true if the lib has been initiate or false otherwise

      • getModuleList

        public static java.util.ArrayList<ACASModule> getModuleList()

        Return the associated module list of this application.

        Throws:
        java.util.concurrent.ExecutionException
        java.lang.InterruptedException

      • sendMessage

        public static void sendMessage(int tag,
               java.lang.String idDest,
               Bundle extras)

        Use for send a message to a particular module identified by idDest param.

        Parameters:
        tag - An unique id for this transaction
        idDest - The unique id of the receiver of message
        extras - The bundle container of data
        Throws:
        ACASNonInititateException - If library non initiate by initiate(Context, String)

      • broadcast

        public static void broadcast(int tag,
             Bundle extras)

        Use for send a message to all receiver of this application.

        Parameters:
        tag - An unique id for this transaction
        extras - The bundle container of data
        Throws:
        ACASNonInititateException - If library non initiate by initiate(Context, String)

      • getMessageByTag

        public static ACASMessage getMessageByTag(int tag)

        Get a message by tag, return null if not found.

        Parameters:
        tag -
        Returns:
        ACASMessage or null if no message were found
        Throws:
        ACASNonInititateException - If library non initiate by initiate(Context, String)
        See Also:
        com.acas.sources.ACASMessage}

      • addToListenerList

        public static void addToListenerList(ACASOnMessageReceivedListener listener)

        Use for add an receiver to listener list, it will notified of all future ACASMessage who application receive

        Don't forget to remove it with removeToListenerList(ACASOnMessageReceivedListener)} !

        Parameters:
        listener - The listener who was added into list
        Throws:
        ACASNonInititateException - If library non initiate by initiate(Context, String)
        See Also:
        com.acas.sources.ACAS#removeToListenerList(ACASOnMessageReceivedListener)}}

      • removeToListenerList

        public static void removeToListenerList(ACASOnMessageReceivedListener listener)

        Remove one listener from the list of active ACASMessage receiver.

        Parameters:
        listener - The listener who was removed from list
        Throws:
        ACASNonInititateException - If library non initiate by initiate(Context, String)
        See Also:
        com.acas.sources.ACAS#addToListenerList(ACASOnMessageReceivedListener)}

      • addToListenerModuleList

        public static void addToListenerModuleList(ACASOnListModuleReceiver listener)

        Use for add an receiver to listener list, it will notified of all future ACASModule who the application receives

        Don't forget to remove it with removeToListenerModuleList(ACASOnListModuleReceiver) !

        Parameters:
        listener - The listener who was added into list
        Throws:
        ACASNonInititateException - If library non initiate by initiate(Context, String)
        See Also:
        com.acas.sources.ACAS#removeToListenerModuleList(ACASOnListModuleReceiver)}

      • removeToListenerModuleList

        public static void removeToListenerModuleList(ACASOnListModuleReceiver listener)

        Remove one listener from the list of active ACASModule receiver.

        Parameters:
        listener - The listener who was removed from list
        Throws:
        ACASNonInititateException - If library non initiate by initiate(Context, String)
        See Also:
        com.acas.sources.ACAS#addToListenerModuleList(ACASOnListModuleReceiver)} }

      • addToListenerModuleList

        public static void addToListenerModuleList(ACASOnListModuleReceiver listener,
                           java.lang.String entryPoint)

        Use for add an receiver to listener list, it will notified of the ACASModule that the application receives filtered by @entryPoint

        Don't forget to remove it with removeToListenerModuleList(ACASOnListModuleReceiver) !

        Parameters:
        listener - The listener who was added into list
        entryPoint - The entry point type to filter.
        Throws:
        ACASNonInititateException - If library non initiate by initiate(Context, String)
        See Also:
        com.acas.sources.ACAS#removeToListenerModuleList(ACASOnListModuleReceiver)}
